WorkItem.Description:
This is a minor issue, but hopefully it will save some clicks.
 
I've subscribed to rawr releases; I get an email whenever a new release is announced.  There is an outdated link in the email, which points to the original 4.0 announcment page (now retired).
 
I suggest changing the link to the Version Notes (http://rawr.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=VersionNotes) page.
 
Here's the top of the message I get:
 
    New release "Rawr 4.1.05" for project rawr
    Rawr is now web-based. The link to use Rawr4 is: http://elitistjerks.com/rawr.php
    This is the Cataclysm Release. More details can be found at the following link
    http://rawr.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=237262
WorkItem.Summary: [Base] Rawr announcement email has incorrect link
